quiz.question: Which designer is associated with the signature shade 'Valentino red'?
Which house revived the Dior Saddle Bag originally created around 2000?
Which French institution legally defines and registers the official list of haute couture houses?
options: Chambre Syndicale de la Haute Couture
quiz.answer: Chambre Syndicale de la Haute Couture
